options.name: Magismith
options.description: Gain Access to Magismithing. You can use Beginner and Novice Level Catalysts in your Magismithing Recipes.

options.name: Magismith Catalyst Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage. Additionally, Catalysts that you create count as 1 tier higher for the purpose of Magismith Recipes.

options.name: Jewelry Infusions
options.description: You can add an additional Infusion to Rings you Craft.

options.name: Variable Mitigations
options.description: When you add a Magismithing Infusion to Chest Armor, a Shield or a Weapon, add +2 Mitigation of your choice against Dark, Divine, Arcane or Psychic to the Object.

options.name: Forged in Magic
options.description: Any Object you Craft receives the Immutable and Conduit Slot Infusion without consuming an Infusion Slot when you add a Lead Ingot to the Recipes.

options.name: Craft : Transfer Enchantment
options.description: You spend 1 Day and a Pinch of Powdered Gold to transfer all of the magical effects from one piece of Equipment to another non-magical piece of Equipment that occupies the same Equipment Slot as the original.

options.name: Improved Magismithing
options.description: Gain +1 Smithing. Additionally, you can use Journeyman Catalysts in your Magismithing Recipes at Level 7, Expert at 9 and Master at 11.
